segments.text: Looking at this scene, the woman is polishing that plate so carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress and apron make her look like a classic homemaker.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet is running wild, water cascading over the sink edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking the cabinets and making a mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's oblivious, standing right in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over there, the boy is on that unstable stool, stretching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is so irresponsible; he could fall and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is egging him on, hand out for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those open cabinet doors make it look even more precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stack of dishes by the sink could tumble if anyone slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone turning off that water?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is peaceful, but this kitchen is a disaster zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the kids are stealing cookies like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She needs to notice before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
